name: 2 Bedroom in Boston's Back Bay! #203
neighborhood_overview: Near the Prudential building and Copley Square where you may be working, but also only a few short blocks away from Newbury Street where the A-List shops are located!
description:
New England brownstone experience in the heart of Back Bay, near the Prudential building and Copley Square.

The space
Set back off of St. Botolph and Garrison Street, it is a hidden gem. The entryway hints at exclusivity and once you enter the recently re-done courtyards you'll see why this is one of a kind living in downtown.

Guest access
The courtyard has fountains, gardens, benches, and more it's a retreat from the hustle and bustle of downtown Boston.

Other things to note
Pets allowed subject to breed and weight restrictions. A one-time, non-refundable pet fee of $300 per pet is required.
